post.name: Facility Manager (contractual)
post.monthly_remuneration: Rs. 50,000/- per month (consolidated). Remuneration will not be a constraint for deserving candidate. TA/DA admissible as per rules for official tour/visit
job_profile: Management/Supervision of maintenance, gardening, housekeeping team to the required standard, ensuring maximum productivity, efficiency, and quality service while adhering to budget and compliance standards
Supervise day-to-day maintenance of all aspects of the estate including buildings, tree cutting, horticulture, housekeeping, waste management, etc.
Supervise utility staff and empanelled vendors
post.contract_tenure: Initially one year, may extend up to 3 terms, total duration including renewals limited to 3 years

qualification.essential: Graduate from a recognized University in any discipline
qualification.desirable: Experience relevant to job profile, preference for candidates from educational institutes, retired persons from Govt./Autonomous/PSU/Central/State University with required experience

application_instructions.submission: Application addressed to the Registrar, NIT Agartala with details (Post applied for, Name, Father/Husband's Name, Present & Permanent address, Date of birth & Age, Email, Mobile, Category, Educational Qualification, Experience, Other Info, Agreement to terms YES/NO), along with self-attested certificates in a single PDF via email at establishment@nita.ac.in by 25-02-2025
application_instructions.interview: Shortlisted candidates will be informed via email. They must bring filled-in application, passport-size photograph, originals and self-attested copies of certificates for verification

terms_conditions: Appointment purely on contract basis on fixed pay, initially one year, extendable up to 3 terms, total duration 3 years
Decision of Competent Authority is final & binding
One month notice or pay in lieu required for leaving during contract
Engagement may be discontinued at any time; does not confer right of continuation
Competent Authority may relax/modify eligibility criteria if candidate otherwise suitable
Canvassing or outside influence liable for rejection
Superannuated employees of Central Govt./State Govt./PSU encouraged to apply
Experience means relevant experience acquired after minimum educational qualification; experience certificate from employer required
In case of dispute, Director's decision is final & binding
content.issued_by: Col. (Dr) Ashish Badola, Registrar, NIT Agartala
copy_to: Registrar, Tripura University, Suryamaninagar, Amtali, West Tripura
